newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: CBT links with Computer Sciences.
newsitem.headline: CBT links with Computer Sciences.

text.p: CBT Group Plc, an Irish software company quoted on Nasdaq, on Thursday said it had signed a $7.8 million contract with Computer Sciences Corp.

"The three-year agreement with Computer Sciences Corp, ... represents $7.8 million in total contract value, $5.0 million of which is net new business, and stands as a resounding endorsement of the effectiveness of our courseware and deployment systems," CBT chairman William McCabe said in a results statement.
CBT announced a rise in second quarter net income to $4.7 million from $1.9 million on revenues of $25 million.

The software group also said it signed a $400,000 agreement with Wisconsin Technical College System giving Wisconsin's 16 technical college districts access to more than 350 of CBT's information technology training titles over a three-year period.
